text: 12 Apostles is an independent record label based in London, England and Brooklyn, USA. 12 Apostles Records specialises in 12 inch vinyl record releases that are distributed by Cargo International in the UK. == Artists on 12 Apostles label == * Dsico * Girl talk * Hamster Dragster * Oh Astro * ROC * Ollo * The Mavs == Related pages == * List of record labels == Other websites == * Official website * 12 Apostles on MySpace Category:British record labels Category:American record labels Category:Indie music record labels Category:2000 establishments Category:Independent record labels
title: 12 Apostles (record label)
